### Part 1.1

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(psych)
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)

iris.df <- data.frame(iris)
model <- rpart(Species ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width + Petal.Length + Petal.Width, data = iris.df)

rpart.plot(model, extra=104, fallen.leaves=T, type=4, main="Iris Dataset Decision Tree")

```
